1. AI startup SandboxAQ adds Nvidia, Google as backers, raises additional $150 million  Reuters
  2. Nvidia And Google Bet Big On Quantum AI With $150M Investment In SandboxAQ, Raising Series E Round To $450 Million  Yahoo Finance
  3. SandboxAQ Secures USD 450 Million in Series E Funding  EnterpriseTalk
  4. SandboxAQ Closes Series E Round with Expanded Investor Base  Financial IT
  5. SandboxAQ attracts major investors for AI expansion  Digital Watch Observatory
